params._newVersion: Address of factory contract to be added.

params._contractAddress: address of contract to be appended to list.
params._signatoryAddress: Address of account to add contract to.
params._validationType: Type of signature contract 1: AllSig, 2: MultiSig ****** Petition contract not added to list as address cannot be explicitly requested for signing.

params._contractAddress: address of contract to be appended to list.
params._hash: Document hash so document hash can be mapped to a list of contract addresses.
params._validationType: Type of signature contract 1: AllSig, 2: MultiSig, 3: Petition

params._address: Address of admin to be removed.

params._oldVersion: Address of factory contract to be removed.

params._hash: document hash that is uploaded for signing

getAddressFromHash(bytes32).return: array of struct containing address of contract and document hash of contract

params._address: Address of account to be queried.

getSignatoryContracts(address).return: array of struct containing contract address and type of contract. 1: AllSig, 2: MultiSig, 3: Petition

getSigningInvitationCount(address).return: Number of times the account has been requested to sign on a document

getUploaderContracts(address).return: array of struct containing contract address and type of contract. 1: AllSig, 2: MultiSig, 3: Petition

getUploaderCount(address).return: Number of times account has uploaded a document for signing

isAccountAdmin(address).details: called by factories when checking to see if msg.sender of eternalStorage address change is admin

params._address: address of account to check if admin
Address of account to be given rights to.

addFactoryContract(address).notice: Adds factory contract to allowed list

addSignatoryContract(uint256,address,add.notice: Appends the signature contract to a list of contracts where account is required to sign.

addUploaderContract(uint256,address,addr.notice: Appends the signature contract to a list of contracts where account uploaded document.

deleteAdmin(address).notice: Remove admin rights to an address

deleteFactoryContract(address).notice: Removes factory contract from allowed list

getAddressFromHash(bytes32).notice: Get all signature contracts with the given document hash

getMetricsValue(bytes32).notice: Number of times the account has been requested to sign on a document

getSignatoryContracts(address).notice: Array of addresses where the account has been requested to sign on a document

getSigningInvitationCount(address).notice: Number of times the account has been requested to sign on a document

getUploaderContracts(address).notice: Array of addresses which account has created

getUploaderCount(address).notice: Number of times account has uploaded a document for signing

incrementMetrics(bytes32).notice: increments the value assigned to the metric key by one.

isAccountAdmin(address).notice: Checks whether provided account is admin

setAdmin(address).notice: Give admin rights to an address
